page.title: 07Mayors School Visit
page.content: {THE MAYOR OF CALDERDALE} came to {Moorside Junior School}and his wife came too.They both wore a big chain like a big heavy necklace.The Mayors name is Mr. Lawler and his chain has a diamond in it.The Mayor is a governor of our school.He asked us some questions and we asked him some questions.The Mayoress told us that she had six girls and one boy.She was taking the girls to Buckingham Palace but she was not taking her son.Mr. Mellor ,our teacher took some photographs of the Mayor and Mayoress standing with us.Then they went to the other classes.
